paragraphs.text:
%jdbc
SELECT  count(descriptor) counter, descriptor FROM requests group by descriptor having count(descriptor) > ${mincount=20000} ORDER BY counter desc

msg.data:
counter	descriptor
114901	Loud Music/Party
42846	Pothole
28555	No Access
26517	ENTIRE BUILDING
24060	Street Light Out
23394	Banging/Pounding
20997	PESTS
20897	Loud Talking

paragraphs.text:
%jdbc
select complaint_type, count(complaint_type) count from service_request group by complaint_type having count(complaint_type) > ${mincount=0} and count(complaint_type) < ${maxcount=10000} order by count desc

msg.data:
complaint_type	count
Street Light Condition                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         	15
Noise - Residential                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            	10

Broken Muni Meter                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              	2
Noise - Commercial                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             	2
Dirty Conditions                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               	2
DOF Property - Owner Issue                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     	2

Plumbing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       	1

paragraphs.text:
%jdbc
select complaint_type, descriptor, count(descriptor) count from service_request group by complaint_type, descriptor having count(descriptor) > ${mincount=1} order by complaint_type, descriptor, count

msg.data:
complaint_type	descriptor	count
Blocked Driveway                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               	No Access                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      	7
Broken Muni Meter                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              	Coin or Card Did Not Register                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  	2
Building/Use                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   	Illegal Conversion Of Residential Building/Space                                                                                                                                                                                                               	4
Dirty Conditions                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               	E12 Illegal Dumping Surveillance                                                                                                                                                                                                                               	2
DOF Property - Owner Issue                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     	Billing Address Incorrect                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      	2
Electrical                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     	Electrical Wiring Defective/Exposed                                                                                                                                                                                                                            	4
General Construction/Plumbing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  	Building Shaking/Vibrating/Structural Stability                                                                                                                                                                                                                	2
General Construction/Plumbing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  	Cons - Contrary/Beyond Approved Plans/Permits                                                                                                                                                                                                                  	2
General Construction/Plumbing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  	Sidewalk Shed/Pipe Scafford - Inadequate Defective/None                                                                                                                                                                                                        	2
Noise - Commercial                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             	Loud Music/Party                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               	2
Noise - Residential                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            	Loud Music/Party                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               	9
Street Condition                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               	Cave-in                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        	2
Street Light Condition                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         	Glassware Hanging                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              	2

paragraphs.text:
%jdbc
SELECT longitude, latitude from service_request where complaint_type = 'Noise - Residential' and latitude is not null and longitude is not null

%jdbc
SELECT to_char(created_date, 'day') weekday, date_trunc('day', created_date) AS dd, count(created_date) as daily_sum FROM service_request where EXTRACT(year from created_date) = '${year=2014,2010|2011|2012|2013|2014|2015|2016|2017|2018}' GROUP BY weekday, dd ORDER BY date_trunc('day', created_date)
